data.lyric:
[ti:Message In A Bottle (Taylor’s Version) (From The Vault)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Message In A Bottle (Taylor’s Version) (From The Vault) - Taylor Swift
[00:01.97]Lyrics by：Shellback/Taylor Swift/Max Martin
[00:03.12]Composed by：Shellback/Taylor Swift/Max Martin
[00:04.27]I know that you like me
[00:07.43]And it's kinda frightening standing here waiting waiting
[00:12.45]And I became hypnotized by freckles and bright eyes tongue tied
[00:20.21]But now you're so far away
[00:24.34]And I'm down feeling like a face in the crowd
[00:32.06]I'm reaching for you terrified
[00:37.34]Cause you could be the one that I love
[00:41.64]I could be the one that you dream of
[00:45.78]A message in a bottle is all I can do
[00:49.35]
[00:49.89]Standing here hoping it gets to you
[00:54.03]You could be the one that I keep and I
[00:57.97]Could be the reason you can't sleep at night
[01:02.31]A message in a bottle is all I can do
[01:06.47]Standing here hoping it gets to you
[01:10.45]
[01:12.73]These days I'm restless
[01:15.83]Workdays are endless look how you made me made me
[01:20.74]But time moves faster replaying your laughter disaster
[01:28.59]Cause now you're so far away
[01:32.64]And I'm down feeling like a face in the crowd
[01:40.31]I'm reaching for you terrified
[01:45.66]Cause you could be the one that I love
[01:48.05]
[01:49.90]I could be the one that you dream of
[01:54.09]A message in a bottle is all I can do
[01:58.24]Standing here hoping it gets to you
[02:02.33]You could be the one that I keep and I
[02:06.40]Could be the reason you can't sleep at night
[02:10.57]A message in a bottle is all I can do
[02:14.73]Standing here hoping it gets to you
[02:18.67]
[02:19.78]How is it in London
[02:22.19]
[02:23.69]Where were you while I'm wondering
[02:26.41]
[02:27.75]If I'll ever see you again
[02:33.42]
[02:39.66]You could be the one that I love mmm
[02:45.10]And now I'm standing here hoping it gets to you
[02:49.85]Cause you could be the one that I love
[02:52.15]
[02:54.01]I could be the one that you dream of
[02:58.17]A message in a bottle is all I can do
[03:02.31]Standing here hoping it gets to you
[03:06.43]You could be the one that I keep and I
[03:10.56]Could be the reason you can't sleep at night
[03:14.75]A message in a bottle is all I can do
[03:18.86]Standing here hoping it gets to you
[03:22.44]
[03:25.12]You could be the one that I love
[03:27.34]
[03:29.20]You could be the one that I love my love
[03:33.83]
[03:34.70]And now I'm standing here hoping this gets to you
data.trans:
[ti:Message In A Bottle (Taylor’s Version) (From The Vault)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.97]//
[00:03.12]//
[00:04.27]我知道你对我情真意切
[00:07.43]漫漫无期的等待 恐惧慢慢攻占内心
[00:12.45]你的点点雀斑 明亮眼睛 让我心醉神迷 变得口齿不清
[00:20.21]但现在你那样遥不可及
[00:24.34]我垂头丧气 像是淹没在了茫茫人海里
[00:32.06]我伸手去触及你 内心满是恐惧
[00:37.34]因为你会是我的心之所属
[00:41.64]我会是你的梦中情人
[00:45.78]我唯一能做的 就是将思念装进漂流瓶 
[00:49.35]
[00:49.89]伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
[00:54.03]你会是我日思夜想的爱人
[00:57.97]我也会是你辗转反侧的原因
[01:02.31]我唯一能做的 就是将思念装进漂流瓶
[01:06.47]伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
[01:10.45]
[01:12.73]这些日子里 我坐立不安
[01:15.83]没日没夜地工作 看看你让我多么度日如年 度日如年
[01:20.74]但光阴似箭 你的笑声回荡耳边 仿佛灾厄降临
[01:28.59]因为现在你远在天边
[01:32.64]我垂头丧气 像是淹没在了茫茫人海里
[01:40.31]我伸手去触及你 内心满是恐惧
[01:45.66]因为你会是我的心之所属
[01:48.05]
[01:49.90]我会是你的梦中情人
[01:54.09]我唯一能做的 就是将思念装进漂流瓶
[01:58.24]伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
[02:02.33]你会是我日思夜想的爱人
[02:06.40]我也会是你辗转反侧的原因
[02:10.57]我唯一能做的 就是将思念装进漂流瓶
[02:14.73]伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
[02:18.67]
[02:19.78]你在伦敦过得好吗
[02:22.19]
[02:23.69]你在哪里 我不知道
[02:26.41]
[02:27.75]我能否再见到你
[02:33.42]
[02:39.66]你会是我的心之所属
[02:45.10]现在我伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
[02:49.85]因为你会是我的心之所属
[02:52.15]
[02:54.01]我会是你的梦中情人
[02:58.17]我唯一能做的 就是将思念装进漂流瓶
[03:02.31]伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
[03:06.43]你会是我日思夜想的爱人
[03:10.56]我也会是你辗转反侧的原因
[03:14.75]我唯一能做的 就是将思念装进漂流瓶
[03:18.86]伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
[03:22.44]
[03:25.12]你会是我的心之所属
[03:27.34]
[03:29.20]你会是我的心之所属 我的挚爱
[03:33.83]
[03:34.70]现在我伫立在这里 希望它能漂向你
